name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full Frame (35mm) Focal Length for Flickr

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays crop factor, 35mm equivalent & angular field of view on Flickr EXIF meta info pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
v1.14 
- HTTPS photo pages
- info on photo page (with delay)
- code rewrite

v1.13 
- fix for DSLRs

v1.12
- title fix to comply with branding guidelines
- added 128x128 icon

v1.11
- added Vietnamese and Indonesian support
- fixed crop factor for resized portrait photos

v1.1
- added angular field of view

v1.0
- first public release
